name: Undercover (Starlight777)
description:
Help a mysterious secret agent to destroy a terrorist organization!

Lead him through each level by jumping across platforms, avoiding drones and collecting a ton of coins!

Use A and D to walk, SPACE to jump and R to restart the level if you're stuck.

Made for the PB Game Jam 4: Sneaky, as my first ever game to go public!
I'm planning on updating this after the Jam and adding more levels, obstacles, power ups and statistics to encourage speed running and coin collecting. I'll also add some secret rooms and easter eggs, so stay tuned!
